SEARCH
Package seasofyore

Interface GamePhase

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGamePhase, BattlePhase, SalvoBattlePhase, ShipPlacementPhase
public interface GamePhase
Represents a phase in the Seas of Yore game. Each phase defines specific behaviors for handling interactions, updates, and rendering. Examples of phases include ship placement and battle. Implementations of this interface define phase-specific logic for gameplay.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void

    Cleans up resources or resets configurations when the phase ends.

  • Method Details

    • enterPhase

      void enterPhase(GameController controller)
      Called when the phase starts. Allows the phase to initialize state and configure the UI.
      Parameters:
      controller -

    • handleCellClick

      void handleCellClick(int x, int y, QuadrantPanel quadrantPanel)
      Handles a cell click event during this phase.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the clicked cell
      y - the y-coordinate of the clicked cell
      quadrantPanel - the QuadrantPanel where the click occurred

    • handleQuadrantMovement

      void handleQuadrantMovement(Point dragLayerPoint, QuadrantPanel src)
      Handles mouse movement events within a QuadrantPanel during this phase.
      Parameters:
      dragLayerPoint - the point in the drag layer corresponding to the movement
      src - the QuadrantPanel where the movement occurred

    • handleInput

      void handleInput(MouseEvent e)
      Handles user input during this phase.
      Parameters:
      e -

    • update

      void update()
      Updates the state of the phase (e.g., animations, timers).

    • render

      void render(Graphics g)
      Renders any custom visuals for the phase (optional).
      Parameters:
      g -

    • cleanup

      default void cleanup()
      Cleans up resources or resets configurations when the phase ends. This is a default implementation that does nothing but can be overridden by specific phases.
